schema.name: Please select the area of your activity
Please select the area of your activity

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		FirmID as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Country as string,
		interviewkey as string,
		interviewid as string,
		A01 as string,
		A02 as string,
		A03 as string,
		A04 as string,
		A06 as string,
		A07 as string,
		A09 as string,
		A10 as string,
		A11 as string,
		A12 as string,
		A13 as string,
		B01 as string,
		B03 as string,
		B17 as string,
		BA03 as string,
		BA04 as string,
		BA07 as string,
		BA08 as string,
		BA11 as string,
		BA12 as string,
		BA13 as string,
		BA14 as string,
		BA15 as string,
		BB02 as string,
		BB08 as string,
		BB09 as string,
		BC03 as string,
		BC04 as string,
		C04 as string,
		C05 as string,
		DA01 as string,
		DB01 as string,
		DB02 as string,
		DB03 as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcNTF
source(output(
		SURVEY_DETAILS_SR_KEY as integer,
		RECORD_HASH_VALUE as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_NAME as string,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME as string,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL as string,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME as string,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED as string,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED as string,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION as string,
		INTERVIEW_KEY as string,
		INTERVIEW_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingDIM
SrcNTF select(mapColumn(
		INTERVIEW_KEY = interviewkey,
		INTERVIEW_ID = interviewid,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME = A01,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE = A02,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED = A03,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME = A07,
		INTERVIEWEE_NAME = A09,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED = A10,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION = A11,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL = A12,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION = A13,
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
DISTINCT derive(SOURCE_RECORD_HASH = sha2(256,
INTERVIEWEE_NAME,
INTERVIERWER_NAME,
INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE,
INTERVIEWEE_POSITION,
INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL,
SUPERVISOR_NAME,
TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED,
TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED,
INTERVIEW_DURATION,
INTERVIEWEE_NAME,
INTERVIEW_ID)) ~> SourceRecordHash
SourceRecordHash, ExistingDIM exists(SOURCE_RECORD_HASH == RECORD_HASH_VALUE,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Exists derive(BATCH_ID = 1,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentTimestamp(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentTimestamp()) ~> RunInfor
RunInfor alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
SelectColumns aggregate(groupBy(INTERVIEWEE_NAME,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION,
		INTERVIEW_KEY,
		INTERVIEW_ID,
		FILE_NAME),
	COUNT = count()) ~> DISTINCT
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		SURVEY_DETAILS_SR_KEY as integer,
		RECORD_HASH_VALUE as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_NAME as string,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME as string,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION as string,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL as string,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME as string,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED as string,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED as string,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION as string,
		INTERVIEW_KEY as string,
		INTERVIEW_ID as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		RECORD_HASH_VALUE = SOURCE_RECORD_HASH,
		INTERVIEWEE_NAME,
		INTERVIERWER_NAME,
		INTERVIEEE_TELEPHONE,
		INTERVIEWEE_POSITION,
		INTERVIEWEE_EMAIL,
		SUPERVISOR_NAME,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_STARTED,
		TIME_INTERVIEW_ENDED,
		INTERVIEW_DURATION,
		INTERVIEW_KEY,
		INTERVIEW_ID,
		BATCH_ID,
		SOURCE,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMSURVEYDETAILS

source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		FirmID as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Country as string,
		interviewkey as string,
		interviewid as string,
		A01 as string,
		A02 as string,
		A03 as string,
		A04 as string,
		A06 as string,
		A07 as string,
		A09 as string,
		A10 as string,
		A11 as string,
		A12 as string,
		A13 as string,
		B01 as string,
		B03 as string,
		B17 as string,
		BA03 as string,
		BA04 as string,
		BA07 as string,
		BA08 as string,
		BA11 as string,
		BA12 as string,
		BA13 as string,
		BA14 as string,
		BA15 as string,
		BB02 as string,
		BB08 as string,
		BB09 as string,
		BC03 as string,
		BC04 as string,
		C04 as string,
		C05 as string,
		DA01 as string,
		DB01 as string,
		DB02 as string,
		DB03 as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcSTGNTR
SrcSTGNTR unpivot(output(
		Variables as string,
		Answer_KEY as string
	),
	ungroupBy(ProjectID,
		Context,
		FirmID,
		{Date of data collection},
		Country,
		interviewkey,
		interviewid,
		A01,
		A02,
		A03,
		A04,
		A06,
		A07,
		A09,
		A10,
		A11,
		A12,
		A13,
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> Unpivot1
Unpivot1 sink(input(
		{ProjectID|Context|FirmID|Date of data collection|Country|interviewkey|interviewid|A01|A02|A03|A04|A06|A07|A09|A10|A11|A12|A13|B01|B03|B17|BA03|BA04|BA07|BA08|BA11|BA12|BA13|BA14|BA15|BB02|BB08|BB09|BC03|BC04|C04|C05|DA01|DB01|DB02|DB03|FILE_NAME|LOAD_TIMESTAMP} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['NTF_UNPOVITE.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> TrgUnpovitNTR

parameters{
	P_DWH_FILE_NAME as string
}
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		FirmID as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Country as string,
		interviewkey as string,
		interviewid as string,
		A01 as string,
		A02 as string,
		A03 as string,
		A04 as string,
		A06 as string,
		A07 as string,
		A09 as string,
		A10 as string,
		A11 as string,
		A12 as string,
		A13 as string,
		B01 as string,
		B03 as string,
		B17 as string,
		BA03 as string,
		BA04 as string,
		BA07 as string,
		BA08 as string,
		BA11 as string,
		BA12 as string,
		BA13 as string,
		BA14 as string,
		BA15 as string,
		BB02 as string,
		BB08 as string,
		BB09 as string,
		BC03 as string,
		BC04 as string,
		C04 as string,
		C05 as string,
		DA01 as string,
		DB01 as string,
		DB02 as string,
		DB03 as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcStageNTF
SrcStageNTF derive(NEW_DATALAKE_FILE = 'NTF/'+replace($P_DWH_FILE_NAME, '.csv', '_'+toString(currentTimestamp(),'YYYYMMdd_HHmmss')+'.csv')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		FirmID as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Country as string,
		interviewkey as string,
		interviewid as string,
		A01 as string,
		A02 as string,
		A03 as string,
		A04 as string,
		A06 as string,
		A07 as string,
		A09 as string,
		A10 as string,
		A11 as string,
		A12 as string,
		A13 as string,
		B01 as string,
		B03 as string,
		B17 as string,
		BA03 as string,
		BA04 as string,
		BA07 as string,
		BA08 as string,
		BA11 as string,
		BA12 as string,
		BA13 as string,
		BA14 as string,
		BA15 as string,
		BB02 as string,
		BB08 as string,
		BB09 as string,
		BC03 as string,
		BC04 as string,
		C04 as string,
		C05 as string,
		DA01 as string,
		DB01 as string,
		DB02 as string,
		DB03 as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'NEW_DATALAKE_FILE') ~> DWHNTF

parameters{
	P_DWH_FILE_NAME as string
}
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of training} as string,
		Course_name as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service theme 1} as string,
		{Service theme 2} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Location as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Name of the entity} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		Country as string,
		Size as string,
		{ISIC code division} as string,
		{HS 6 digit code (if available)} as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcStageOLAC
SrcStageOLAC derive({Year of birth} = case({Year of birth}=='N/A', 
'',
iif(toInteger({Year of birth}) < year(currentUTC()), '', {Year of birth})
),
		NEW_DATALAKE_FILE = 'OLAC/'+replace($P_DWH_FILE_NAME, '.csv', '_'+toString(currentTimestamp(),'YYYYMMdd_HHmmss')+'.csv')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of training} as string,
		Course_name as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service theme 1} as string,
		{Service theme 2} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Location as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Name of the entity} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		Country as string,
		Size as string,
		{ISIC code division} as string,
		{HS 6 digit code (if available)} as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'NEW_DATALAKE_FILE') ~> DWHOLAC

parameters{
	P_DWH_FILE_NAME as string
}
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of platform} as string,
		{SheTrades Project} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		Country as string,
		Email as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		City as string,
		Size as string,
		ISIC as string,
		{Please select the area of your activity} as string,
		HS as string,
		{Owner/ top manager gender} as string,
		{Owner/ top manager age} as string,
		{Type of event} as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		{Registration Date} as string,
		{Submission Date} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{Date of birth} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		{BSO ownership} as string,
		{Office Address} as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		Website as string,
		Twitter as string,
		LinkedIn as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcStageSheTrades
SrcStageSheTrades derive({Year of birth} = iif(toInteger({Year of birth}) < year(currentUTC()), '', {Year of birth}),
		NEW_DATALAKE_FILE = 'SHE_TRADES/'+replace($P_DWH_FILE_NAME, '.csv', '_'+toString(currentTimestamp(),'YYYYMMdd_HHmmss')+'.csv')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of platform} as string,
		{SheTrades Project} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		Country as string,
		Email as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		City as string,
		Size as string,
		ISIC as string,
		{Please select the area of your activity} as string,
		HS as string,
		{Owner/ top manager gender} as string,
		{Owner/ top manager age} as string,
		{Type of event} as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		{Registration Date} as string,
		{Submission Date} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{Date of birth} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		{BSO ownership} as string,
		{Office Address} as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		Website as string,
		Twitter as string,
		LinkedIn as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'NEW_DATALAKE_FILE') ~> DWHSHETRADES
